synopsis.text: On a fateful Christmas Eve in 2029, Japan was ravaged by the Apocalypse Virus, leading to a decade of military rule by the international force known as the GHQ. In this dystopian future, Shuu Ouma, a seemingly ordinary high school student, stumbles upon the enigmatic pop idol, Inori, who is a key member of the resistance group, Funeral Parlor. After a chance encounter, Shuu acquires the extraordinary ability to draw out the hidden powers, or 'voids,' from others, making him a valuable asset in the fight against the oppressive GHQ. As Shuu navigates this new world of rebellion and danger, he must decide where his loyalties lie and how to use his newfound power to change the world. Join Shuu and Inori in their thrilling journey to uncover the truth behind the Apocalypse Virus, the GHQ, and the mysterious Funeral Parlor, in a tale filled with action, suspense, and heart-pounding moments.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
